name: iPN - Elsevier Pure Portal
description: Elsevier Pure is a research information management system (RIMS) that supports data cataloging and optionally, data repository functions for institutions. It enables management of research metadata, datasets, and related content, with workflows for metadata creation, validation, and DOI minting via integration with external data repositories. Pure can act as both a data catalogue and repository, offering interoperability with other systems and customizable features relevant to institutional research data management (RDM) needs.
